title: After Three Decades, Gallagher Still Enjoys Teaching the Civil War (University of Virginia)
text: ( Source : University of Virginia ) Gary Gallagher has been teaching about the Civil War for nearly 30 years and is still enthusiastic about it. 'I think it takes a supreme act of will to make this material boring,' he said. 'It is the biggest
